articles.title: Samsung boosts Joe Biden's chipmaking ambitions with Texas plant upgrade - Financial Times
articles.description: South Korean group set to outdo rival TSMC with cutting-edge 2nm chip production in US by 2026 as part of $40bn investment

articles.author: Sam Reynolds
articles.title: BTC, ETH Rise as Hong Kong Bitcoin ETF Applicants Say They've Been Approved - CoinDesk
articles.description: The Securities and Futures Commission, Hong Kong's markets regulator, has not made an official announcement.
articles.content: Bitcoin (BTC) has risen 2.8% over 24 hours, trading above $66,500, and ether (ETH) has advanced to $3,240, according to CoinDesk Indices data, as multiple issuers in Hong Kong said they'd been approv… [+1021 chars]

articles.author: Saqib Ahmed, Laura Matthews
articles.title: Dollar's rally supercharged by diverging US rate outlook - Reuters
articles.description: A rally in the U.S. dollar is accelerating, as stubborn inflation sows doubts over how aggressively the Federal Reserve will be able to cut rates this year compared to other central banks.
